to.uri: sql:SELECT actual_exam_place as column1, exam_month as column2, exam_hour_of_day as column3, COUNT(*)||'' as column4 FROM ( select actual_exam_place,device_type, to_char(exam_date,'yyyy') as exam_year,to_char(exam_date,'MM') as exam_month_of_year, to_char(exam_date,'yyyy-MM') as exam_month,to_char(exam_date,'hh24') as exam_hour_of_day from ris_exam where device_type in ('CT','MR') and actual_exam_place is not null ) cb_view GROUP BY exam_hour_of_day, actual_exam_place, exam_month?dataSource=iiDS
